item.title: jane主题中安装百度统计

item.description: 获取百度统计代码 登陆百度统计/管理/自有网站/获取代码, 得到形如 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 <script> var _hmt = _hmt || []; (function() { var hm = document.createElement("script"); hm.src = "https://hm.baidu.com/hm.js?9dd8aaaaaaaaaaa7a8bde80b13fe8eaf"; var s = document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0]; s.parentNode.insertBefore(hm, s); })(); </script> 我们要的就

item.title: Hugo Install Base Win10
item.author: 273412935@qq.com (龙哥)
item.description: win10中安装hugo Env os: win10 sh: bash Step Chocolatey (Windows) If you are on a Windows machine and use Chocolatey for package management, you can install Hugo with the following one-liner: 1 choco install hugo -confirm 安装之后，很重要的一步，是重启 git shell或者是

item.title: Hugo
item.author: 273412935@qq.com (龙哥)
item.description: 大神 一位大神的线上deploy shell 1 2 3 4 5 [rooteblog hugo]# cat publish_hugo.sh #!/bin/bash # hugo server --theme=beautifulhugo --bind 0.0.0.0 --baseURL https://w.yangcs.net -p 443 -D -d public hugo --theme=beautifulhugo --baseURL https://www.yangcs.net -D -d public [rooteblog hugo]#
